name: Ceramic Decorative Vase
description: A beautifully handcrafted ceramic vase that brings a touch of elegance to any room. Ideal for fresh flowers or as a standalone decorative piece.
shortDescription: Handmade ceramic vase for your home.

reviews.comment: Perfectly complements my living room decor.
Beautiful but a little heavier than expected.

name: Organic Green Tea Pack
description: Premium organic green tea leaves sourced from sustainable farms. Rich in antioxidants and naturally refreshing.

reviews.comment: Tastes so pure and refreshing.
Great flavor but packaging could be better.

name: Noise‑Cancelling Over‑Ear Headphones
description: High-fidelity Bluetooth over-ear headphones with active noise cancellation, long battery life, and premium comfort.

reviews.comment: Impressive noise cancellation and very comfortable.
Great sound, but a bit heavy for long use.

name: Stainless Steel Insulated Water Bottle
description: Keep your beverages hot or cold for hours with this double-wall, vacuum-insulated stainless steel bottle.

reviews.comment: Keeps my water ice cold all day!
Very good, but lid is bulky.

name: Lightweight Running Shoes
description: Mesh running shoes designed for breathability and comfort during long runs or daily workouts.

reviews.comment: Very breathable and perfect for jogging.
Comfortable but cushioning could be better.

name: Luxury Wrist Watch
description: A sleek and stylish wrist watch with leather strap and minimalist dial design. Perfect for both casual and formal wear.

reviews.comment: Elegant and timeless design.
Leather strap is very comfortable but could be softer.

name: Women’s Floral Maxi Dress
description: Flowy floral maxi dress with breathable fabric, perfect for summer days or evening hangouts.

reviews.comment: Beautiful and comfortable for summer.
Lovely print but sizing runs a bit large.

name: Portable Bluetooth Speaker
description: Compact and rugged Bluetooth speaker with 12-hour battery life and clear sound. Ideal for travel.

reviews.comment: Great sound for its size.
Battery life is okay but it could be longer.

name: Smart Fitness Watch
description: Track your fitness journey with heart rate monitor, step counter, and sleep tracking. Sleek and lightweight design.

reviews.comment: Perfect for daily fitness tracking.
Good but screen is small.

name: Men’s Denim Jacket
description: Classic denim jacket with button-up front and two chest pockets. Stylish and versatile for all seasons.

reviews.comment: Great fit and very durable.
A bit stiff but softens after wash.

name: Leather Wallet
description: Slim leather wallet with multiple card slots and a compartment for cash. Crafted from genuine leather.

reviews.comment: Compact and looks great.
Would be better with more card slots.

name: Modern Table Lamp
description: A sleek modern table lamp with LED light and metal finish. Creates a warm and cozy ambiance.
shortDescription: Modern metal table lamp with LED.

reviews.comment: Stylish lamp and very functional.
Light is bright but stand feels a bit light.

name: Wireless Ergonomic Keyboard
description: An ergonomic wireless keyboard designed to reduce wrist strain, with long battery life and comfortable keys.

reviews.comment: Very comfortable for long typing sessions.
Battery life is good but a little noisy.

name: Non-stick Cookware Set (3 pcs)
description: Three piece non-stick cookware set includes a frying pan, saucepan, and pot. PFOA-free for healthy cooking.

reviews.comment: Great set for daily cooking.
Very good, just wish the handles were cooler.

name: Standing Floor Lamp
description: Elegant standing lamp with fabric shade and adjustable height. Adds a cozy glow to living rooms or bedrooms.

reviews.comment: Stylish and great light.
Nice lamp but a little wobbly.

name: Wireless Ergonomic Mouse
description: Ergonomic wireless mouse designed to reduce wrist strain with a 2.4GHz receiver and long battery life.

reviews.comment: Very ergonomic and works smoothly.
Good but a bit light.

name: Travel Duffel Bag
description: Durable travel duffel bag made with water-resistant fabric, featuring multiple compartments and adjustable shoulder strap.

reviews.comment: Perfect size for weekend trips.
Good bag but strap could be wider.

name: Ceramic Coffee Mug Set (Set of 4)
description: Set of four ceramic coffee mugs with a matte finish. Holds up to 350ml, sturdy and stylish.

reviews.comment: Love the pastel colors, perfect for my kitchen.
Very good quality, but a little heavy.

name: Adjustable Yoga Mat
description: Eco-friendly yoga mat with adjustable carry strap. Non-slip surface and medium thickness for comfort.
shortDescription: Eco non-slip yoga mat with strap.

reviews.comment: Great grip and very durable.
Comfortable but slightly heavy.

name: Luxury Sunglasses
description: Polarized sunglasses with UV protection and metal frame. Stylish and reliable.

reviews.comment: Very classy and protects my eyes well.
Stylish but lens glare a bit.

name: Leather Backpack
description: Premium genuine leather backpack with multiple compartments, padded laptop sleeve, and elegant finish.

reviews.comment: Very sturdy and stylish.
Love the look, but it's a bit heavy when empty.

name: Women’s Crossbody Bag
description: Compact crossbody bag made from vegan leather. Lightweight and perfect for day-to-day essentials.

reviews.comment: Perfect for quick errands.
Stylish but strap is short.

name: USB-C Power Bank 20000mAh
description: High-capacity 20000mAh USB-C power bank with dual output and fast charging support.

reviews.comment: Charges my phone multiple times.
Quite big but worth the capacity.

name: Bluetooth Smart Scale
description: Smart body scale that connects via Bluetooth to track weight, BMI, and body fat over time.

reviews.comment: Helps me track my progress accurately.
Good, but the readings vary a little.

name: Classic Leather Belt
description: Durable full-grain leather belt with classic buckle. A timeless accessory for any wardrobe.

reviews.comment: Very sturdy and stylish.
Good belt but leather feels stiff.

name: Ceramic Bowl Set (4 pcs)
description: Set of four ceramic bowls for serving salads, soups or cereals. Microwave and dishwasher safe.

reviews.comment: Perfect size for my breakfast cereal.
Nice bowls but they chip easily if dropped.

name: Portable Projector
description: Compact HD portable projector with HDMI and USB input, ideal for movie nights or presentations.

reviews.comment: Perfect for small movie nights.
Good value, but not super bright.

name: Classic Aviator Sunglasses
description: Timeless aviator sunglasses with polarized lenses and durable metal frame.

reviews.comment: Classy and very protective.
Stylish but little heavy.

name: Portable Blender
description: USB rechargeable portable blender for smoothies on the go. Easy to use and clean.

reviews.comment: Blend smoothies anywhere. Very handy.
Good but small capacity.

name: Soft Throw Blanket
description: Luxuriously soft throw blanket made of microfiber fleece. Perfect for cozy nights on the sofa.

reviews.comment: So soft and warm, love it.
Great blanket, but a little big for my couch.

name: Children’s Wooden Toy Car
description: Classic wooden toy car made from sustainable wood. Safe, smooth edges and great for imaginative play.

reviews.comment: My son loves pushing it around!
Well-made, but a bit small.

name: Makeup Brush Set (10 pcs)
description: Complete makeup brush set for face and eyes, with soft synthetic bristles and a carrying case.

reviews.comment: Extremely soft brushes and good coverage.
Nice set but case feels a bit cheap.

name: Electric Steam Iron
description: Powerful steam iron with adjustable temperature, water tank, and self-cleaning function.

reviews.comment: Heats up quickly and steams well.
Good iron but a little heavy to use.

name: Adjustable Laptop Stand
description: Ergonomic laptop stand with adjustable height & angle. Helps improve posture and reduce neck strain.

reviews.comment: Really helps me work ergonomically.
Stable but a bit bulky.

name: Wireless Earbuds with Charging Case
description: True wireless earbuds with charging case, 20-hour total battery, and touch controls.

reviews.comment: Sound is great and case lasts long.
Very nice, but earbuds fall out a bit.

name: Modern Wall Clock
description: Minimalist wall clock with silent sweep movement, perfect for living rooms, offices, or bedrooms.

reviews.comment: Elegant and quiet.
Looks great, but frame is a bit thin.

name: Microfiber Yoga Towel
description: Highly absorbent microfiber yoga towel with non-slip backing, ideal for hot yoga or gym.

reviews.comment: Great absorption and doesn’t slip.
Nice towel, but a little small for me.

name: Decorative Framed Wall Art
description: Stylish framed wall art print featuring modern abstract design. Ready to hang and elevates any space.

reviews.comment: Beautiful art, really lifts up my wall.
Great, but could use more color variety.

name: 19" Portable Monitor
description: Slim 19‑inch portable monitor with USB-C and HDMI support. Perfect for travel and dual-screen productivity.

reviews.comment: Super useful for remote work.
Good monitor but brightness is moderate.

name: LED Desk Lamp with Wireless Charger
description: Modern LED desk lamp with adjustable brightness, color temperature, and a built-in wireless charger at its base.
shortDescription: LED lamp with Qi wireless charger.

reviews.comment: Lamp works great and charger is super handy.
Very functional but a little pricey.
